column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////On my second visit
column2: I order the minestrone soup and a The "Lou" 6" individual pizza. This pizza was good
column3: but not as special as the M. Chicago Classic. The cheese fell of the slices and was difficult to eat and enjoy
column4: as the slices are very small. I recommend sticking to the 9" pan pizzas if you are ordering for one. The soup came out right away
column5: it was hot and had plenty of pasta in it
column6: not watery or light on the ingredients.
